title: Publications
text:
Preprints

Pöntinen, A. K. (equal contr.), Gladstone, R. A. (equal contr.), Pesonen, H. (equal contr.), Pesonen, M., Cléon, F., Parcell, B. J., Kallonen, T., Simonsen, G. S., Croucher, N. J., McNally, A., Parkhill, J., Johnsen, P. J., Samuelsen, Ø., Corander, J. (2023), Β-lactam antibiotic use modulates multi-drug resistant clone success in Escherichia coli populations: a longitudinal multi-country genomic cohort study. Lancet preprint.
Mikkola, P., Martin, O. A., Chandramouli, S., Hartmann, M., Pla, O. A., Thomas, O., Pesonen, H., Corander, J., Vehtari, A., Kaski, S., Bürkner, P.-C. and Klami, A. (2021) Prior knowledge elicitation: The past, present, and future
Aushev, A., Tran, T., Pesonen, H., Howes, A. and Kaski, S. (2021) Likelihood-Free Inference in State-Space Models with Unknown Dynamics
Thomas, O., Pesonen, H., Sá-Leão, R., de Lencastre, H., Kaski, S. and Corander, J. (2020) Split-BOLFI for for misspecification-robust likelihood free inference in high dimensions
Thomas, O., Pesonen, H. and Corander, J. (2020) Generalised Bayes Updates with f-divergences through Probabilistic Classifiers
Thomas, O., Pesonen, H. and Corander, J. (2020) Probabilistic elicitation of expert knowledge through assessment of computer simulations



Conference

Pesonen, H. and Piché, R. (2011) Bayesian positioning using Gaussian mixture models with time-varying component weights pdf JSM, 2011
Pesonen, H. and Piché, R. (2010) Cubature-based Kalman filters for positioning 7th Workshop on Positioning, Navigation and Communication, 2010, 45-49



Thesis
